description: This file is a React component for the frontend of a notes management application. It manages notes creation, update, deletion, and display, interacting with a Supabase backend for data persistence and user authentication.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from the Supabase database for the current user, updates the state with retrieved notes, and auto-selects the first note if available.

methods.name: handleCreateNote
methods.description: Creates a new note in the database with given title and content, then updates local state to include the new note.

methods.name: handleUpdateNote
methods.description: Updates the currently selected note in the database with new title and content, then updates local state.

methods.name: handleDeleteNote
methods.description: Deletes the currently selected note from the database and updates local state accordingly.
